Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

Canek 0.2.2

Changes

  • Fix bug when using SCTransform. (#14)

  • Add BugReports and URL.(#13)

  • Relaxing tests to no consider the names attribute.(#12)

  • Refactor RunCanek() Seurat and SingleCellExperiment interfaces to preserve original objects.

  • Added integration.name argument to RunCanek() to customize the name of the integrated assay.

Canek 0.2.12022-05-10

Changes

  • Fix error in test-Clustering unit-test for latest igraph version. (#7)

Canek 0.2.02022-03-23

  • Initial release to CRAN
